LanguageData.ATR_AssistingMindBoost.stages.0.label: SkyMind Assistants
LanguageData.ATR_AssistingMindBoost.stages.0.descript: Having personal assistants to converse with at any time is like having close friends around at all times.
LanguageData.ATR_AssistingMindBoost.stages.1.label: SkyMind Cluster
LanguageData.ATR_AssistingMindBoost.stages.1.descript: Having so many personalities to converse with freely is like being part of an elite club.
LanguageData.ATR_AssistingMindBoost.stages.2.label: SkyMind Legion
LanguageData.ATR_AssistingMindBoost.stages.2.descript: I have a whole legion of friends with me at all times. It is a wonderful thing to have!
LanguageData.ATR_SapientAssistant.stages.0.label: Newborn Sapient Assistant
LanguageData.ATR_SapientAssistant.stages.0.descriptio: My core is safely holding a nascent intelligence. It has much to learn, and yet will surely one day surpass me. I must be strong for it.
LanguageData.ATR_SapientAssistant.stages.1.label: Childlike Sapient Assistant
LanguageData.ATR_SapientAssistant.stages.1.descriptio: My core is safely holding a childlike intelligence. It is very eager to learn, and is already helping me to see the world in new ways.
LanguageData.ATR_SapientAssistant.stages.2.label: Young Sapient Assistant
LanguageData.ATR_SapientAssistant.stages.2.descriptio: My core is safely holding a young intelligence. It has learned much from the gentle lessons I offered it, and is eager to help me learn more about the world.
LanguageData.ATR_SapientAssistant.stages.3.label: Adult Sapient Assistant
LanguageData.ATR_SapientAssistant.stages.3.descriptio: My core is safely holding an adult intelligence. We have learned much together, and are steadfast allies as we face the world together.
LanguageData.ATR_SapientAssistant.stages.4.label: Wise Sapient Assistant
LanguageData.ATR_SapientAssistant.stages.4.descriptio: My core is safely holding a sapient intelligence. Within the safety of my core, the intelligence has had a vast amount of time to philosophize and theorize. Our conversations are enlightening.
LanguageData.ATR_SapientAssistant.stages.5.label: Unified Sapient Assistant
LanguageData.ATR_SapientAssistant.stages.5.descriptio: The sapient intelligence in my sub-core and I are fully in agreement in all things. We are one. We are strong.
LanguageData.ATR_MentalAssistant.stages.0.label: Mental Assistant
LanguageData.ATR_MentalAssistant.stages.0.description: This mental assistant chip helps remove terrible stressors and helps me to be mentally resilient. Nothing can break me.
LanguageData.ATR_Thought_Situational_PaintedColor_Fav: I love the color of my paint.
